Package com.redis.ds.ds_redis.graph

Class RedisGraphs

java.lang.Object
com.redis.ds.ds_redis.graph.RedisGraphs
public class RedisGraphs extends Object
The RedisGraphs class is responsible for accessing the RedisGraph module commands via the Jedis programmatic library. It designed to simplify the use of core Foundation class objects like items, documents, grids and graphs. You can instantiate this class from the parent RedisDS class. RedisGraph is the first queryable Property Graph database to use sparse matrices to represent the adjacency matrix in graphs and linear algebra to query the graph. Data Model Details Node Label = DataDoc.Name Relationship Type = DataGraphEdge.Name All DataDoc instances must have Data.FEATURE_IS_PRIMARY enabled with one of their items.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Al Cole
See Also:
  • OSS RedisGraph
  • Java RedisGraph
  • The Cypher Property Graph Query Language
  • Java Redis

      public com.redis.foundation.data.DataGrid schemaDocToDataGrid(com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc aSchemaDoc, boolean anIsExtended)
      Convert a data document schema definition into a data grid suitable for rendering in a schema editor UI.
      Parameters:
      aSchemaDoc - Data document instance (representing the schema)
      anIsExtended - If true, then non standard features will be recognized
      Returns:
      Data grid representing the schema definition

    • dataGridToSchemaDoc

      public com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc dataGridToSchemaDoc(com.redis.foundation.data.DataGrid aDataGrid)
      Collapses a data grid representing a schema definition back into a data document schema. This method assumes that you invoked the schemaDocToDataGrid() method to build the data grid originally.
      Parameters:
      aDataGrid - Data grid instance
      Returns:
      Data document schema definition

    • getSchemaKeyName

      public String getSchemaKeyName(boolean anIsNode)
      Generates and returns a unique key name for the graph index that can be used to store/retrieve the definition in Redis.
      Parameters:
      anIsNode - If true, then this key will be for a node schema.
      Returns:
      Search schema key name

    • saveSchemaDefinition

      public void saveSchemaDefinition(com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc aGraphSchemaDoc, boolean anIsNode) throws RedisDSException
      Stores the graph schema definitions in the Redis database. This schema definition is one that could be used by a parent application to describe the current search schema.
      Parameters:
      aGraphSchemaDoc - Graph schema data document instance
      anIsNode - If true, then this key will be for a node schema.
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis data source exception

    • loadSchema

      public Optional<com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc> loadSchema(boolean anIsNode) throws RedisDSException
      Loads the schema definition from the Redis DB into a data document instance. If the load fails or the key does not exist, then the optional data document will not be present.
      Parameters:
      anIsNode - If true, then this key will be for a node schema.
      Returns:
      Optional data document instance
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis data source exception

    • schemaExists

      public boolean schemaExists(boolean anIsNode) throws RedisDSException
      Identifies if the schema definition for the graph has been stored in the Redis DB.
      Parameters:
      anIsNode - If true, then this key will be for a node schema.
      Returns:
      true if it exists and false otherwise
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis data source exception

    • add

      public void add(com.redis.foundation.data.DataGraph aDataGraph) throws com.redis.foundation.std.FCException
      Stores all the nodes and relationships captured in the data graph instance into the database. Note: The method assumes that Cypher strings can grow to the 512 MB size limit of a Redis String data structure, so no size limit checks are enforced.
      Parameters:
      aDataGraph - Data graph instance
      Throws:
      com.redis.foundation.std.FCException - Graph database exception

    • createPropertyIndex

      public int createPropertyIndex(com.redis.foundation.data.DataGraph aDataGraph, com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc aSchemaDoc) throws RedisDSException
      Creates a property index for each data item with the RedisGraphModule.FEATURE_IS_PROPERTY_SEARCH feature enabled. Property indexes are limited to nodes.
      Parameters:
      aDataGraph - Data graph instance
      aSchemaDoc - Schema definition data document instance
      Returns:
      Count of indices created
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - RedisGraph data source exception

    • dropPropertyIndex

      public int dropPropertyIndex(com.redis.foundation.data.DataGraph aDataGraph, com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc aSchemaDoc) throws RedisDSException
      Drops the property indexes for each data item with the RedisGraphModule.FEATURE_IS_PROPERTY_SEARCH feature enabled. Full text indexes are limited to nodes.
      Parameters:
      aDataGraph - Data graph instance
      aSchemaDoc - Schema definition data document instance
      Returns:
      Count of indices dropped
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Graph database exception

    • createFullTextIndex

      public int createFullTextIndex(com.redis.foundation.data.DataGraph aDataGraph, com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc aSchemaDoc) throws RedisDSException
      Creates a full text index for each data item with the RedisGraphModule.FEATURE_IS_FULLTEXT_SEARCH feature enabled.
      Parameters:
      aDataGraph - Data graph instance
      aSchemaDoc - Schema definition data document instance
      Returns:
      Count of indices created
      Throws:

    • queryPattern

      public com.redis.foundation.data.DataGraph queryPattern(com.redis.foundation.ds.DGCriteria aDGCriteria) throws com.redis.foundation.std.FCException
      Queries the graph database for a graph path based on the data graph criteria provided. If you intend to visualize the graph after the query, then you must ensure you assign node and relationship schemas prior to executing this method - they are used to identify data items with primary ids.
      Parameters:
      aDGCriteria - Data graph criteria instance
      Returns:
      A data graph instance populated with matching nodes and relationships
      Throws:
      com.redis.foundation.std.FCException - Graph database exception

    • queryNode

      public Optional<com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc> queryNode(com.redis.foundation.ds.DGCriteria aDGCriteria) throws com.redis.foundation.std.FCException
      Queries the graph database for a single node based on the data graph criteria provided.
      Parameters:
      aDGCriteria - Data graph criteria instance
      Returns:
      Optional data document instance representing a node
      Throws:
      com.redis.foundation.std.FCException - Graph database exception

    • queryCypher

      public com.redis.foundation.data.DataGraph queryCypher(String aGraphDBName, String aCypherStatement) throws com.redis.foundation.std.FCException
      Queries the graph database for a graph path based on the cypher statement provided.
      Parameters:
      aGraphDBName - Name of the graph database
      aCypherStatement - Cypher "MATCH ... RETURN" statement
      Returns:
      A data graph instance populated with matching nodes and relationships
      Throws:
      com.redis.foundation.std.FCException - Graph database exception

    • queryNodeText

      public com.redis.foundation.data.DataGraph queryNodeText(String aName, String aNodeLabel, String aQueryString) throws com.redis.foundation.std.FCException
      Performs a fulltext query against the nodes of the graph database based on the RedisGraphModule.FEATURE_IS_FULLTEXT_SEARCH being enabled in the vertex schema data document instance and the node label identified.
      Parameters:
      aName - Name of the graph database
      aNodeLabel - Label of node (used for index id)
      aQueryString - Query string
      Returns:
      A data graph instance populated with mating nodes
      Throws:
      com.redis.foundation.std.FCException - Graph database exception

    • queryNodeText

      public com.redis.foundation.data.DataGrid queryNodeText(String aName, com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc aVertexSchemaDoc, String aQueryString, int anOffset, int aLimit) throws com.redis.foundation.std.FCException
      Performs a fulltext query against the nodes of the graph database based on the RedisGraphModule.FEATURE_IS_FULLTEXT_SEARCH being enabled in the vertex schema data document instance and all node labels.
      Parameters:
      aName - Name of the graph database
      aVertexSchemaDoc - Vertex schema data document instance
      aQueryString - Query string
      anOffset - Starting offset into the matching content rows
      aLimit - Limit on the total number of rows to extract from the content source during this fetch operation.
      Returns:
      Data grid representing all rows that match the criteria in the content source (based on the offset and limit values).
      Throws:
      com.redis.foundation.std.FCException - Redis Labs exception

    • queryAll

      public com.redis.foundation.data.DataGraph queryAll(String aName) throws com.redis.foundation.std.FCException
      Queries the graph database for all nodes and relationships.
      Parameters:
      aName - Name of the graph database
      Returns:
      A data graph instance populated with all nodes and relationships
      Throws:
      com.redis.foundation.std.FCException - Graph database exception

      aDataDoc - Node data document instance
      Returns:
      true if delete operation succeeded and false otherwise
      Throws:
      com.redis.foundation.std.FCException - Graph database exception

    • deleteRelationship

      public int deleteRelationship(com.redis.foundation.data.DataGraph aDataGraph, com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc aSrcNode, com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc aDstNode, com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc aDataDoc) throws RedisDSException
      Deletes the relationship identified by the data document instance and its relationship between the source and destination nodes from the graph database identified by the data graph instance.
      Parameters:
      aDataGraph - Data graph instance
      aSrcNode - Source node of the relationship
      aDstNode - Destination node of the relationship
      aDataDoc - Relationship data document instance
      Returns:
      count of relationships deleted
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Graph database exception

    • deleteRelationship

      public int deleteRelationship(com.redis.foundation.data.DataGraph aDataGraph, com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc aDataDoc) throws RedisDSException
      Deletes the relationship identified by the data document instance from the graph database identified by the data graph instance.
      Parameters:
      aDataGraph - Data graph instance
      aDataDoc - Relationship data document instance
      Returns:
      count of relationships deleted
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Graph database exception

    • delete

      public void delete(com.redis.foundation.data.DataGraph aDataGraph) throws RedisDSException
      Deletes the graph database identified by the data graph instance. This logic assumes that secondary property and text indices are removed upon graph deletion.
      Parameters:
      aDataGraph - Data graph instance
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis data source exception
